name: Get in the Zone Quiz | USA | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which time zone would you find the state of Minnesota in?
questions.explanation:
Central.

	Minnesota is in the northern central part of the country, bordered by Manitoba and Ontario in Canada.

questions.text: Driving on the interstate through Montana, which time zone would you be in?
questions.explanation:
Mountain.

	With its capital city of Helena, Montana is bordered by North and South Dakota to the east, then Wyoming and Idaho to the south and west, respectively.

questions.text: In which of these time zone/s is the state of Kentucky located?
questions.explanation:
Central and Eastern.

	Kentucky is virtually cut in half by the two time zones.  This makes life a little awkward, with its capital of Frankfort in the Eastern zone, and the major city of Bowling Green in the Central zone.

questions.text: The great state of Alabama is in which time zone?
questions.explanation:
Central.

	With its capital city of Montgomery, the state's eastern border runs along the western border of the Eastern zone.

questions.text: Santa Fe, Alamogordo, and Albuquerque are all cities in New Mexico that are in which time zone?
questions.explanation:
Mountain.

	Although the capital city is Santa Fe, Albuquerque overshadows it by its size and annual hot-air balloon festival.

questions.text: Which time zone would you be most likely to be in if you were in Wisconsin?
questions.explanation:
Central.

	With only a few miles stepping over the Eastern time zone, Wisconsin is bordered by Lake Michigan to the east and Lake Superior to the north.

questions.text: Which of the following is not in the Pacific time zone?
questions.explanation:
Hawaii.

	The state and the islands of Hawaii are in the Hawaii-Aleutian time zone.

questions.text: El Paso, Texas, which is south of Las Cruces, New Mexico and north of Juarez, Mexico is located in which time zone?
questions.explanation:
Mountain.

	El Paso is the western-most city in Texas.  Most of the state is in the Central zone.

questions.text: The NFLs Indianapolis Colts played their home games in which time zone?
questions.explanation:
Eastern.

	Indianapolis is located in the center of the state of Indiana.

questions.text: Which of the following states is split in half by the Mountain and Central time zone?
questions.explanation:
South Dakota.

	While South Dakota's capital city of Pierre is in the Central zone, cities just 10 miles west are in the Mountain zone.
